ygData.subject: RE: What to do with a level 24?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm - solo? Forget it.  Well, maybe try South Karana and find blue aviaks. Do the bard nuke thing: denon s, chord s, hymn, rinse, repeat. Group! Group on
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm - solo? Forget it. Well, maybe try South Karana and find blue aviaks.
Do the bard nuke thing: denon's, chord's, hymn, rinse, repeat.

Group!

Group on birdies in SK.

Get a partner and go kill Herman the Hermit (Wait! what am I saying - u r
on my server and I am telling u the good spots! South East corner of SK in
house inside a wall use AE to pull him.)

Go to HighKeep - basement of the bank. Start in the Lookout room & Guard
room until you get a feel for this place. Soon you will be effective in the
Warrior room (stronger goblins - higher level players.) These goblins
require groups (occasionally a lev 30 shows and wants to solo them) they are
melee fites for the most part. Anthem or Chant for the tanks. Binding and
chains are welcome. AE songs are ok in there unless someone has trained
gobs to the guards and them they chase the gobs back down - rare but it
happens. Spawn times are far enough apart that you can heal the group
between although the pallies will no doubt waste mana healing them selves
after battle - I guess they just enjoy medding. If the group is co-lev, you
prolly get a bub every 2 hours.

Sylly the bard!

-----Original Message-----
From: kbachman [mailto:kbachman@...]
Sent: Monday, September 20, 1999 3:26 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] What to do with a level 24?

From: kbachman <kbachman@...>

Does anyone have any suggestions about where to go to earn
solo experience at my level (24)?
Does anyone have any tactical suggestions to permit me to
keep my butt alive when grouped with mediocre
players?
